titlestmt.titleproper: RG 074:021, Genealogical Notes on Families of Litchfield, Connecticut
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Connecticut State Library staff.

publicationstmt.p: Copyright Â© 2009 by the Connecticut State Library

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Paul E. Baran on March 24, 2009

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.unittitle: Genealogical notes on families of Litchfield, Connecticut
did.abstract: The Notes were compiled by Payne Kenyon Kilbourne, M.A. who was secretary of the Litchfield County Historical and Antiquarian Society, author of "Sketches and Chronicles of the Town of Litchfield, Connecticut", which was published in Hartford in 1859.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: From Note page: The Notes were compiled by Payne Kenyon Kilbourne, M.A. who was secretary of the Litchfield County Historical and Antiquarian Society, author of "Sketches and Chronicles of the Town of Litchfield, Connecticut", which was published in Hartford in 1859. In the preface to the "Sketches and Chronicles", Mr. Kilbourne wrote, "The Family Genealogies in my possession, and for which I had hoped to find room, would alone fill a volume of the size of this".

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The Notes are arranged alphabetically by families, with miscellaneous memoranda in the back of the book. Newspaper clippings are interspersed throughout.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: These records are stored at an off-site facility and therefore may not be available on a same-day basis.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: This phhotostatic copy of "Genealogical Notes on Families of Litchfield, Connecticut" was made at the Connecticut State Library from the volume loaned for the purpose on June 1, 1939, by Mr. Charles R. Hale of Hartford.

did.unittitle: Genealogical Notes on Families of Litchfield, Connecticut
